item1: Erie Indemnity Company ("Indemnity", "we", "us", "our") publicly held Pennsylvania business corporation since its incorporation 1925 served attorney-in-fact subscribers (policyholders) Erie Insurance Exchange ("Exchange"). Exchange, which also commenced business 1925, Pennsylvania-domiciled reciprocal insurer writes property casualty insurance. Exchange wholly owned property casualty insurance subsidiaries including: Erie Insurance Company, Erie Insurance Company New York, Erie Insurance Property & Casualty Company Flagship City Insurance Company, wholly owned life insurance company, Erie Family Life Insurance Company ("EFL"). primary function attorney-in-fact perform policy issuance renewal services behalf subscribers Exchange.
